message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $142.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $137.50?
I'm still a bit away from my budget, Alice. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $138?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm running out of room to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. How about we meet at $132?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I think we're getting close to my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $129, and that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to accept that price?
